[ARG0: Republicans] wrapped up three crucial U.S. Senate primaries in West Virginia , Indiana and Ohio on Tuesday by [V: nominating] [ARG1: candidates who embraced President Donald Trump] , while Democratic voters rejected insurgents from the left to stick with the party ’s mainstream .
